name: Battle Squadron [SG]
description: Battle Squadron is a vertically scrolling shooter for the Amiga and ported a year later to the Sega Mega Drive console, for one or two players. It is a sequel to Hybris. The game was later ported to iOS devices (2011), Android (2012) and in 2013 also to AmigaOS 4, Windows, OS X and MorphOS.
